name: SEAL2 Application
summary: Learn about .S2A files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Example application files included with SEAL2 are calc.s2a (similar to the Windows calculator program), explorer.s2a (the file and folder browsing application), and sol.s2a (the game of Solitaire).
NOTE: SEAL only runs in DOS. If you don't have a version of DOS, you can use a DOS emulation program such as DOSBox to run SEAL.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
